segment.source: Client Management Console Application Virtualization Node
segment.target: Client Management Console Application Virtualization Node

segment.source: Client Management Console Application Virtualization Node
segment.target: Client Management Console Application Virtualization Node

segment.source: Client Management Console: Application Virtualization Node
segment.target: Client Management Console: Application Virtualization Node

segment.source: The Application Virtualization node is the top-level node in the Scope pane of the Application Virtualization Client Management Console.
segment.target: The Application Virtualization node is the top-level node in the Scope pane of the Application Virtualization Client Management Console.

segment.source: This node displays the name of the computer the console is currently controlling, or it displays "Local" if the console is connected to the local computer.
segment.target: This node displays the name of the computer the console is currently controlling, or it displays "Local" if the console is connected to the local computer.

segment.source: By right-clicking the Application Virtualization node, you can display the Properties dialog box to configure the Application Virtualization Desktop Client or Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services).
segment.target: By right-clicking the Application Virtualization node, you can display the Properties dialog box to configure the Application Virtualization Desktop Client or Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services).

segment.source: The Properties dialog box contains the following elements:
segment.target: The Properties dialog box contains the following elements:

segment.source: Application Virtualization Properties: File System Tab
segment.target: Application Virtualization Properties: File System Tab

segment.source: Application Virtualization Properties: Import Search Path Tab
segment.target: Application Virtualization Properties: Import Search Path Tab

segment.source: Application Virtualization Client Management Console Reference
segment.target: Application Virtualization Client Management Console Reference
